thread.title: BRIEF-Capital Power Announces Approval Of NCIB For Purchase Of Up To 9.3 Mln Common Shares

title: BRIEF-Capital Power Announces Approval Of NCIB For Purchase Of Up To 9.3 Mln Common Shares

organizations.name: brief-capital power announces approval of ncib

text: Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Capital Power Announces Approval Of NCIB For Purchase Of Up To 9.3 Mln Common Shares Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Capital Power Corp: * CAPITAL POWER ANNOUNCES APPROVAL OF NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID FOR PURCHASE OF UP TO 9.3 MILLION OF ITS COMMON SHARES * CAPITAL POWER - TSX HAS APPROVED COâ€˜S NCIB TO PURCHASE AND CANCEL UP TO 9.3 MILLION COMMON SHARES DURING 1-YEAR PERIOD FROM FEB 21, 2018 TO FEB 20, 2019
